attributes.action: OPEN A SMALL GROCERY SHOP IN HIGHER ODCOMBE SOMERSET
attributes.additional_details:
I believe in our small village we all come together and help eachother as much as we can as a community.
At times it’s very difficult for the elderly and parents to travel quite a while to get supplies for survival especially the ones that has not yet got their divers license because of medical reasons, so they have to depend on others to help them!
I do understand that there is online shopping available but it’s not always guaranteed to be accurate! 
I think we would all agree that it will definitely benifit all of us to have a small shop built in odcombe.
attributes.background: Open a shop in our small village to help the people in our community from travelling too far.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a matter for retailers.
